articles.author: Jack Rathborn
articles.title: Ashes weather forecast as rain threatens England hopes in Manchester - The Independent
articles.description: Ben Stokes’ side can level the Ashes series at Old Trafford, but Australia will hope for rain to boost their hopes of a draw
